item.title: Plz plz help!
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

ok help i was trying to leech this copy & past tutorial but look what happen!

sugestion plz
i evn tryed to remove it but it give me error still!

here was the tutorial i was trying to leech!:

today i will teach you how to make admin glow difficultness: 1/10

Add this in client.java

public int adminglow = false;
Add this in your commands

[code]if(command.startsWith(“adminglowoff”)) {
adminglow = false;
sendMessage(“Admin glow off!”);
}

if(command.startsWith(“adminglowon”)) {
adminglow = true;
sendMessage(“Admin glow on”);
}
[/code]
Now in boolean process (in client.java) add this

if(adminglow == true){ stillgfx(###, absX, absY); }

Be sure to replace ### with your gfx id!
Have fun!


Help

p.s. how u get siba items

Read full topic
